attributes.comment:
I am opposed to an increase in the filing fees for adoption related services. I have already had to
pay twice for one adoption that hasn't been completed yet and wil probably have to pay a third time
due to the tie ups in Guatemala. I feel the fees are high enough along with the other fees that must
be paid to adopt. If you are going to make the fees higher, then make the expiration date last
longer than 15 months for fingerprints and 18 months for approval. Many adoptions are now taking
longer than this time and therefore many people have to update both fees.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Terri Maestrole
